title: Team Serenity Is Now Recruiting!
body:
Hey all,

Team Serenity is now recruiting! ~

We have three positions available, them being :

* Support Main
* Jungle Main
* Adc Sub
* Mid Sub

TSY is a High Bronze & Silver based team.       (We won't be accepting anyone higher ranked than Silver.)

TSY runs through Excel sheets & Discord. Both these requirements must be ready to use before contacting me.

Anyone interested in joining will have to add me ingame so we can talk privately.

                                                                                                                     ~ KillVearn

replies.body:
Hey guys, 
Interested in being the ADC / Mid Sub. 
I'm currently s4 ADC main, but ive been meddling with mid.
Champion pool is huge.
You can contact me at kenrick.leh@gmail.com

@ Grey
S5 Jungle Main. I'll add you in game ? ;3
Hey man, I'll get back to you tomorrow afternoon. Sorry & ty.
I'm gold v if you want a mid/adc sub
